content.rendered:
Directed by Anurag Kashyap

Written by Kanika Dhillon

Cast Taapsee Pannu (Rumi Bagga). Abhishek Bachchan (Robbie Bhatia). Vicky Kaushal (Vicky Sandhu). Jasmin Bajwa (Keerat). Ashnoor Kaur (Kiran). Swairaj Sandhu (Mr. Bhatia- Robbie’s Father). Neelu Kohli (Mrs. Bhatia- Robbie’s Mother). Poonam Shah (Twin Dancer #1). Priyanka Shah (Twin Dancer #2). Sukhmani Sadana (Dentist Lovely Kaur). Saurabh Sachdeva (Kaka Ji). Arshpreet Singh (Babloo) . Abdul Quadir Amin (Samar). Gaurav Amlani (Raja). Akshay Arora (Chachaji). Arun Bali (Daji).Toranj Kayvon. Vikram Kochhar (Servant). Scott Milburn (Wedding Guest). Probir Sabnis (Bartender). Deependra Singh (Sanju). Rajinder Singh (Lawyer).Zebby Singh. Shubham Anmol Sood (Jassi).Ramandeep Yadav. Samir Zaidi (Bartender). TejInder Singh Khamkha (Photographer (uncredited))

Language Hindi

Producers Kavan Ahalpara. Manish Bhogte. Nitin Dalvi. Kanika Dhillon. Mrunalini Havaldar. Kanupriya. Hetvi Karia. Danish Khan. Madhu Mantena Varma. Aanand L. Rai. Ajay Rai. Himanshu Sharma. Amit Singh

Production Colour Yellow Production. Phantom Film
